org.dynalang.dynalink.support

Class ClassMap<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dynalang.dynalink.support.ClassMap<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the values in the map

    public abstract class ClassMap<T>
extends Object
    A dual map that can either strongly or weakly reference a given class depending on whether the class is visible from a class loader or not.
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    Attila Szegedi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ClassMap(ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a new class map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract T computeValue(Class<?> clazz)
      Compute the value associated with the given class.
      T get(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns the value associated with the class
      ClassLoader getClassLoader()
      Returns the class loader that governs the strong referenceability of this class map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassMap

        protected ClassMap(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Creates a new class map. It will use strong references for all keys and values where the key is a class visible from the class loader, and will use weak keys and soft values for all other classes.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - the classloader that determines strong referenceability.

    • Method Detail

      • computeValue

        protected abstract T computeValue(Class<?> clazz)
        Compute the value associated with the given class. It is possible that the method will be invoked several times (or even concurrently) for the same class parameter.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to compute the value for
        Returns:
        the return value. Must not be null.

      • getClassLoader

        public ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Returns the class loader that governs the strong referenceability of this class map.
        Returns:
        the class loader that governs the strong referenceability of this class map.

      • get

        public T get(Class<?> clazz)
        Returns the value associated with the class
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class
        Returns:
        the value associated with the class
